text: BV Den Helder, for sponsorships reasons Dozy BV, is a Dutch women's basketball club based in Den Helder. Established in 1983, it plays in the Women's Basketball League (WBL). The club has won 14 titles. ==History== The club was founded in 1983. Before, there was a team as part of BV Noordkop, however the ladies team decided to established a separate club to further its ambitions. Since then, the team has played in the Dames Eredivisie. ==Honours== Women's Basketball League *Champions (14): 1985, 1988–1991, 1996, 1998–2000, 2004–2006, 2008, 2009 ==Notable players== {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" style="font-size:95%;" |- !Criteria |- | To appear in this section a player must have either: * Played at least three seasons for the club. * Set a club record or won an individual award while at the club. * Played at least one official international match for their national team at any time. * Played at least one official WNBA match at any time. |} ==References== Category:BV Den Helder Category:Basketball teams established in 1983 Category:Women's basketball teams in the Netherlands
title: BV Den Helder (women)
